name: Download Media Library
author: marcelotorres

sections.description:
Download the files from the Media Library in ZIP format, organized by post type > post name > media type > file extension.

Contribute

  • Github: https://github.com/marcelotorres/download-media-library/
  • Donate: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=G85Z9XFXWWHCY
sections.installation:
• Upload plugin files to your plugins folder, or install using WordPress built-in Add New Plugin installer;
  • Activate the plugin;
  • Navigate to Media -> Download Media Library
sections.changelog:
0.2.1

  • Fixed error after saving/updating pages(https://wordpress.org/support/topic/error-after-savingupdating-pages/)
  • Removed the iconv line 48 ‘download-media-library-admin.php’ file that was causing some problems when generating the .zip file

0.2

  • Fixed major bug that prevented the correct operation of the plugin

0.1

  • Initial version.
